content.p: Each year the University of Nottingham competes in the annual Varsity series against Nottingham Trent University. The series sees the best sportsmen and women from each University competing in some of Nottingham's biggest sporting venues. The Varsity series is a heady mix of fun and rivalry, with an increasing number of students and spectator enjoying events. University of Nottingham are currently ranked 2nd in UK Student sport and have dominated the Varsity series in the past decade (winning 10 out of the last 12 titles). Notts Varsity 2024 returns on Monday 12 February, with a huge Ice Hockey fixture at the Motorpoint Arena for the #GreenandGold to kick off the series! Tickets for this fixture are on sale now and can be purchased here. Follow the latest updates on the official SU Varsity website, or find out more about our sports clubs. Visit the Student Union's Varsity website When you purchase a ticket to the Varsity Events, you must agree to abide by the Varsity Oath All the key dates and up-to-date scores 53 - 5 14 - 12 74 - 79 43 - 48 11.5 - 0.5 3.5 - 1.5 6-4 Media/Press Enquiries For all local and national media/press enquiries for University of Nottingham Sport please contact Mark Bullock, mark.bullock@nottingham.ac.uk David Ross Sports Village University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0)115 74 87000 email: sport@nottingham.ac.uk
